content.webTitle: Cirque du Soleil: Quidam, Hobart | Event listing

fields.headline: Cirque du Soleil: Quidam, Hobart
fields.bodyText: Cirque du Soleil’s Quidam begins with a bored young girl, named Zoe, who is ignored by her parents and lost in the crowd of modern society. Seeking to fill the void, she slides into the imaginary world of Quidam, where she meets a host of characters who encourage her to free her soul. Quidam debuted in Montreal in 1996 and has become one of the company’s most popular shows. The international cast of 46 acrobats, musicians, singers and actors present Cirque du Soleil’s signature feats and ambitious acrobatics. Type of Event: Theatre Venue: Derwent Entertainment Centre 618 Brooker Hwy Glenorchy TAS 7010 Date: from 6 to 10 January 2016 Price: from $62 Website: Derwent Entertainment Centre Telephone: (03) 6251 3170 Sign up to our weekly culture newsletter:
